name: Oleg Artemyev
bio: Russian cosmonaut, veteran of multiple ISS expeditions. Loves photography from space.
funFact: Has taken over 10,000 photos of Earth from orbit!
voiceNote: Every day on the ISS is a new adventure. I love sharing the view with the world!

name: Jessica Watkins
bio: NASA astronaut and geologist. First Black woman on a long-duration ISS mission.
funFact: Enjoys reading science fiction in microgravity.
voiceNote: I get to do science in space and inspire the next generation. That's the best part of my job!

name: Samantha Cristoforetti
bio: ESA astronaut, engineer, and pilot. Holds the record for longest uninterrupted spaceflight by a European astronaut.
funFact: Makes the best espresso in orbit.
voiceNote: Ciao from the ISS! Remember, the sky is not the limit.

name: Sergey Prokopyev
bio: Russian cosmonaut and engineer. Experienced in spacewalks and scientific experiments.
funFact: Has spent over 500 days in space across multiple missions.
voiceNote: Space is our future. Every experiment brings us closer to understanding our universe.

name: Dmitry Petelin
bio: Russian cosmonaut and military pilot. First spaceflight on the ISS.
funFact: Dreamed of becoming an astronaut since childhood.
voiceNote: Being in space is like living a dream. The view of Earth is absolutely breathtaking!

name: Frank Rubio
bio: NASA astronaut and Army helicopter pilot. On his first long-duration spaceflight.
funFact: Speaks Spanish and enjoys playing guitar in space.
voiceNote: From the Army to space - it's been an incredible journey. The ISS is our home away from home.
